author: StarKiller22515
title: You have failed me for the last time Admiral
review: This is a great set for display. Some think it is not a great value but once the set is built it looks amazing. The Darth Vader with arm printing is amazing and looks so good. The sticker of the scene when Vader force chokes Admiral Ozzel is a really great sticker. The set could have been a bit smaller and cheaper if there was not such a big display stand for it. You also have the ability to open and close Vaders meditation chamber which is really cool, and make it lock into place.

author: npapag
title: Iconic, but for adults only
review: The set focuses exclusively on appearance, for exhibit, and its design undoubtedly achieves that. It has excellent detail and the base significantly improves the whole look. Somewhat expensive (EUR85), and with zero playing value. However, I'm happy with the model and would definitely recommend it to collectors; it perfecty decorates my living room!
